items.title: Cursor
items.body: In computer [user interfaces](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User_interface), a **cursor** is an indicator used to show the current position for [user interaction](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human%E2%80%93computer_interaction) on a [computer monitor](openitem:QDZVNohdRe) or other display device that will respond to input from a text input or pointing device.
items.source: Remixed excerpt from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cursor_(user_interface) licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/).

items.title: Computer monitor
items.body: A **computer monitor** is an output device that displays information in pictorial form.
items.source: Remixed excerpt from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_monitor licensed under CC BY-SA 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/).
